I am writing this review after 6 months of usage. Photo quality is really excellent. Key features of this camera:- Expeed 3 Image processing engine- 24.1 mega pixels- 39 Auto Focus points- Flip-out screenThis camera is a great competitor of Nikon D7000. Just go for it. You will never regret.And hats off you Flipkart for your express delivery.

Simply superb! Great pictures, which you can treasure for life. Excellent low light performance too, helping you to take pictures in a variety of situations. Definitely recommenced for all the photography enthusiasts out there!
